title: “Destroying civilian boats without concrete proof is unlawful”: Q&A with Dr Aileen Teague
description: Since September, the US has been carrying out strikes against alleged drug boats off the coast of Venezuela prompting accusations that the actions are illegal. In this Q&A, USAPP Managing Editor, Chris Gilson, speaks to Aileen Teague about the US strikes and …
